page.title: 18THE FOX AND GOOSE
page.content: THE FOX AND GOOSE IS A SMART LOOKING 16TH CENTURY PUBLIC HOUSE.THE PUB IS SITUATED ON A CORNER OF THE A38 ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF BRENT KNOLL PREVIOUSLY ALL THE LAND AROUND THE FOX AND GOOSE WAS OWNED BY THE ABBOTT OF GLASTONBURY.THE PUB USED TO BE A COACHING INN.THE LANDLORD TOLD US THAT YEARS AGO,TWO YEARS AGO,TWO PEOPLE WERE BURIED,UNDER THE PUB. OVER THE YEARS BUISNESS HAS IMPROVED STEADILY AND SO HAS PAID FOR IMPROVEMENTS.THERE ARE TWO PART TIME WORKERS AND ONE FULL TIME MEMBER OF STAFF WORKING THERE.THE PUB AT PRESENT DEALS WITH WHITBREADS BREWERY. AT THE MOMENT THE LANDLORD HAS PLENTY OF PLANS FOR THE FUTURE.HE HOPES TO EXTEND HIS PUB INTRODUCING A SKITTLE ALLEY AND A FUNCTION ROOM.
